title: Justice League Landing Page
description: Adaptive landing page for three resolutions built with HTML, SCSS, and BEM. Includes a simple slider and pagespeed optimization.

title: React TODO Application
description: TODO app built with React using API requests. Features good functionality for user interactions.

title: Hover Cells React App
description: Interactive test project on React featuring hover cells. Mini game with parameter fetching, mod choosing, conditional rendering, and controllable forms.

title: Pets Paw
description: Next.js + Redux + Tailwind.css + SCSS application with API, voting, search, filtering. Multi-display adaptation, dark-light themes, SSR, CSR, pre-rendering, routing, and other Next.js features demonstrated.

title: Gadgets Shop
description: Full-stack team project completed in 70 steps using a kanban desk. Responsive adaptive application. React + Redux + SCSS + Node + Mongo. I took part in the UI development.

title: Bike Shop Landing
description: Landing page for Bikes Shop with adaptive layout, burger menu animations, maintained with SCSS using BEM methodology according to the designer's mockup.
